name: Lumberjack Colony
description:
Press 1 and 2 to switch between rooms, r to instantly regenerate trees/clear stumps.

The tiny lumberjacks chop down trees and use to wood to upgrade themselves and create more lumberjacks.

Unfinished, but still fun to watch. I just noticed that this is actually getting some views. Feel free to leave a comment if you have any ideas for what I could do with it.
